mapper.update: UPDATE TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY SET TPH_CMODIFIERUSERID = #{tphCmodifieruserid}, TPH_DMODIFIEDDATE = SYSDATE, TPH_CMODIFIERPROGRAMID = #{tphCmodifierprogramid}, TPH_NINVEST = NVL(#{tphNinvest}, 0), TPH_NADJUST = #{tphNadjust}, TPH_NADJUST_HOURS = TMG_F_CONV_HHMI2MIN_WITH_MINUS(#{tphNadjustHours}), TPH_NADJUST_TO = NVL(#{tphNadjustTo}, 0), TPH_NADJUST_HOURS_TO = NVL(TMG_F_CONV_HHMI2MIN_WITH_MINUS(#{tphNadjustHoursTo}), 0), TPH_DEXPIRE_ADJUST = #{tphDexpireAdjust}, TPH_DEXPIRE_ADJUST_TO = #{tphDexpireAdjustTo}, TPH_CCOMMENT = #{tphCcomment} WHERE TPH_CEMPLOYEEID = #{tphCemployeeid} AND TPH_DYYYYMMDD = TO_DATE(#{tphDyyyymmdd}, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AND TPH_CCOMPANYID = #{tphCcompanyid} AND TPH_CCUSTOMERID = #{tphCcustomerid}
mapper.select: -- 通常付与の喪失日 SELECT R1.TPH_DEXPIRE_INVEST + 1 AS TPH_DEXPIRE_INVEST -- 付与の有効期限 FROM TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY R1 WHERE R1.TPH_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND R1.TPH_CCOMPANYID = #{companyId} AND R1.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID = #{employeeId} AND R1.TPH_DEXPIRE_INVEST + 1 BETWEEN #{startdate,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE} -- 付与の有効期限 AND NVL(R1.TPH_NINVEST, 0) > 0 -- UNION -- 調整付与の喪失日 SELECT R1.TPH_DEXPIRE_ADJUST + 1 -- 調整付与の有効期限 FROM TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY R1 WHERE R1.TPH_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND R1.TPH_CCOMPANYID = #{companyId} AND R1.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID = #{employeeId} AND R1.TPH_DEXPIRE_ADJUST + 1 BETWEEN #{startdate,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE} -- 調整付与の有効期限 AND ( NVL(R1.TPH_NADJUST, 0) <> 0 -- 調整日数(付与) OR NVL(R1.TPH_NADJUST_HOURS, 0) <> 0 -- 調整時間(付与) ) -- UNION --調整繰越の喪失日 SELECT R1.TPH_DEXPIRE_ADJUST_TO + 1 -- 調整繰越の有効期限 FROM TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY R1 WHERE R1.TPH_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND R1.TPH_CCOMPANYID = #{companyId} AND R1.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID = #{employeeId} AND R1.TPH_DEXPIRE_ADJUST_TO + 1 BETWEEN #{startdate,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE} -- 調整繰越の有効期限 AND ( NVL(R1.TPH_NADJUST_TO, 0) <> 0 -- 調整日数(付与) OR NVL(R1.TPH_NADJUST_HOURS_TO, 0) <> 0 -- 調整時間(付与) )

SELECT NREST_DAYS, NREST_HOURS, CTYPE, CDESC, TO_CHAR(DBEGIN, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as DBEGIN, TO_CHAR(DEND, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as DEND FROM ( TMG_SELECT_HOLIDAY_REST( #{params.custId}, #{params.compId},
( SELECT DISTINCT TNTF_CEMPLOYEEID FROM TMG_NOTIFICATION WHERE TNTF_CCUSTOMERID=#{params.custId} AND TNTF_CCOMPANYID=#{params.compId} AND TNTF_CNTFNO=#{params.ntfNo} ),
#{params.targetUser},
TRUNC(#{params.todayD,jdbcType=DATE}) ) ) WHERE TRUNC(DBEGIN) <= TRUNC(#{params.todayD,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT TO_CHAR(DYYYYMMDD, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS DYYYYMMDD, TO_CHAR(DYYYYMMDD_END, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS DYYYYMMDD_END, NVL(NINVEST, 0) AS NINVEST, NVL(NTHROUGHOUT, 0) AS NTHROUGHOUT, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NVL(NTHROUGHOUT_HOURS, 0), 1) AS NTHROUGHOUT_HOURS, NVL(NADJUST, 0) AS NADJUST, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NVL(NADJUST_HOURS, 0), 1) AS NADJUST_HOURS, NVL(NADJUST_TO, 0) AS NADJUST_TO, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NVL(NADJUST_HOURS_TO, 0), 1) AS NADJUST_HOURS_TO, NINVEST_DAYS, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NINVEST_HOURS, 1) AS NINVEST_HOURS, DECODE(NCONFIRM, NULL, '-', NCONFIRM) AS NCONFIRM, DECODE(NPLANWORKDAY, NULL, '-', NPLANWORKDAY) AS NPLANWORKDAY, DECODE(NPLANWORKDAY_LIMIT, NULL, '-', NPLANWORKDAY_LIMIT) AS NPLANWORKDAY_LIMIT, NPAID_USED_DAYS, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NPAID_USED_HOURS, 1) AS NPAID_USED_HOURS, NPAID_REST_DAYS, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NPAID_REST_HOURS, 1) AS NPAID_REST_HOURS, TO_CHAR(DBEGINDATE_WORK, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS DBEGINDATE_WORK, TMG_F_GET_MGD( CWORKINGDAYS_WEEK, TO_DATE(#{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{custID}, #{compCode}, 'ja' ) AS CWORKINGDAYS_WEEK_NAME, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NAVGWORKTIME, 1) AS NAVGWORKTIME_CALC, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NAVGWORKTIME, 0) AS NAVGWORKTIME_DISP, TO_CHAR(DEXPIRE_INVEST, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS DEXPIRE_INVEST, TO_CHAR(DEXPIRE_ADJUST, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS DEXPIRE_ADJUST, TO_CHAR(DEXPIRE_ADJUST_TO, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS DEXPIRE_ADJUST_TO, NVL(NLOSE_DAYS, 0) NLOSE_DAYS, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NVL(NLOSE_HOURS, 0), 1) NLOSE_HOURS, CCOMMENT FROM TABLE( TMG_SELECT_NYK_LIST( #{custID}, #{compCode}, #{userCode} ) )
WHERE DYYYYMMDD = TO_DATE(#{targetDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd')
ORDER BY DYYYYMMDD DESC
